+ Pedder 的人事档案

-----
[[/=]]

[[=]]
but i cannot break this habit pure anxiety
stuck here searching for some words that you might need
maybe you dont need them its not what were about
and maybe ill just slow it down down down

- greyson chance //shut up//
[[/=]]


> = 欲前往本人的后室中文维基人事页，请点击[*http://backrooms-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/author:pedder 这里]。
